title: Celebs show off their Pride of Britain Awards outfits ahead of the most glamorous night of the year
text:

It's that time of year again when we celebrate the nation's unsung heroes at the Pride of Britain Awards 2019.

A star-studded line-up of famous faces are already in their glamorous hotel rooms undergoing strict beauty regimes to look their best for the highly-anticipated event.

Former I'm A Celebrity campmate Emily Atack shared a stunning snap from her hotel room.

She dazzled in a Hollywood-inspired black gown while debuting her fresh new hairdo.

(Image: xxxxxxxxxxx)

The 29-year-old Inbetweeners star flaunted her sleek brunette lock as she prepared to walk the shimmering Pride of Britain red carpet.

She shared a stunning picture with her 1.6 million followers.

She wrote: "W here we go Pride of Britain. it’s officially winter and it’s a new vibe."

(Image: INSTAGRAM)

Vicky Pattison also shared a glimpse of her Pride Of Britain outfit.

She stunning in a classic black gown with one-shoulder detailing and a subtle mermaid-hemline.

The reality star-turned TV presenter looked typically demure as she wore her raven tresses in a chic updo, while going all out with a glamorous make-up look.

Vicky's velvet gown caught the eye of her 4.4 million Instagram followers who complimented her on her sophisticated look.

She shared: "Off to the Pride Of Britain Awards. Huge THANKYOU to my beautiful, talented and patient team for getting me ready.

"As always you’ve done a lovely job turning this sow’s ear into a silk purse (Mulan reference)."

Former pop sensation Michelle Heaton also took to social media to document her getting ready process ahead of making her red carpet debut.

(Image: prideofbritain /Instagram)

The 40-year-old former Liberty X star showed off her dazzling gold dress with glitzy sequinned embellishments

The strapless ensemble showed off the singer's svelte figure while drawing attention to her glowing golden tan.

Michelle completed her Pride Of Britain fashion ensemble with a pearl clip placed perfectly in her bouncy brunette curls.

The star told her Instagram followers that she "felt like a princess" and that she "cried when she saw the result" of tonight's look.

The Daily Mirror Pride of Britain Awards, in partnership with TSB, will broadcast on ITV on 5th November at 8pm.
description: Emily Atack, Michelle Heaton and Vicky Pattison lead the star-studded arrivals at the Pride Of Britain Awards 2019
